description: This file defines a 'Results' page component for a LightningJS application, displaying the user's quiz score and a restart button.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A LightningJS component that represents the Results page, including layout, state, and event handling.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's state, including layout, theme, and display text.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Registers child components used within this component, such as Button.

methods.name: onInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook to set the score text based on router state.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up event handlers for the Button component, such as the onPress action to restart the quiz.
